这游戏恐怖气氛营造的十分出色，薄雾朦胧的午夜，草丛的点点火光，这一切让我胆战心惊，心跳加速，呼吸加快。真是太恐怖了，好害怕，好想关掉游戏！然后我用低沉的声音告诉我自己:我他妈是个屠夫……我他妈是个屠夫……

Grafik kalitesi, oyun içindeki ortam ve oyunun size verdiği psikolojik his müthiş. Ancak lobi sistemi yok, yani arkadaşlarınızla lobi kurup oynayamıyorsunuz. Arkadaşınızın kurduğu lobiyede giremiyorsunuz, davet sistemi yok kısacası.

1 adet map var diye hatırlıyorum, ancak katil sizin seçtiğiniz karakterlerin karşısında çok güçlü. Kısacası sizden çok hızlı koşuyor, tek vuruşta yere yığılıyorsunuz ve katil oyunu biraz biliyorsa sizi anında öldürebiliyor. Kısacası 31 lira verip alınacak bir oyun değil.

EDİT: Son güncellemeden sonra oyun daha stabil hale geldi, tek sıkıntısı optimizasyonu sanırım. Düşük fps ile oynama ihtimaliniz var eğer çok iyi bir ekran kartına sahip değilseniz, indirimde alınabilecek bir oyun.

玩了一个多礼拜，才熟悉基础操作。因为只玩人类，从刚开始的第一个第二个就挂掉，到现在有时候能成为唯一逃生者，还是蛮有成就感的。今天碰到一个大神黑妹给逃生门开了之后，在屠夫守尸的的情况下救下了我，然后一起跑路了。本来以为是难逃一死，但是看到黑妹猥琐摸进地下室还给我挡了一刀最后 一起跑出去的时候还是蛮开心的~

Every negative review i've read on here as been 100% spot on. And yet pretty much every review starts with a paragraph or two about all the things they love about this game. The reason is: I and so many others have sunk 100's of hours into this game, and yet we feel negative towards it because there's so much to fix still. But trust me when I say it's not all bad, far from it. It is grindy, there are bugs and no progress seems to be being made. But - $20 for 100+ hours of gameplay. I believe i've paid about 15cents per hour and had some deeply frustrating moments, but also some breath taking and exhilerating moments. Things i'll never forget. Even after all this time, it's still terrifying. I've been robbed of a victory at the last second. I've done stupid things that got me killed. I've also risked everything to help a teammate and seen daring rescues. So I want to point out a few things to augment all the other very accurate and negative reviews by highlighting the postives. 

Pro's: 

The concept: Totally unique, great idea.
The sound/music: Amazing, very atmospheric,leaves you totally gripped. 
The characters: Again, just incredible concepts and artwork. Terrifying and believable.
Gameplay: So much to love about this game. Hunting and being hunted by other people. Even though i hate how psycho some killers are, it only adds to how intense and scary the game is. 

Yes it has some very annoying bugs. And it could be so much better. But it's the kind of experience that keeps you hooked. That gets you thinking while at work and leaves you frustrated that you can't play it while away from your computer. whether it's the perk combinations, or tactics, it gets you thinking. if nothing else, i'd wait for a free weekend and give it a try. Who knows, maybe they'll fix the all the bugs one day.

慎重！慎重！看清楚了再考虑买不买！我是新年打折的时候入的，只要51哦，怎么说呢？玩了几天了，游戏本身的设定很不错，很有代入感，但是steam太恶心了，游戏玩了几天，现在只有玩屠夫比较顺畅，玩人类经常出现进房间秒退，据说是steam平台举报的机制的一个bug，反正就是只要有人点了举报你，不论你是不是开g，你都会遇到这个问题，当然，我也不清楚到底是不是这个原因，但是不论如何游戏的发行商和steam应该出面解决啊！可是现在还是没什么回应，也许你们只知道卖钱吧。另一方面，游戏性上如果遇到开黑的，或者开挂的，或者人皇，屠夫就很尴尬了，玩人类还好，输了刺激，赢了欣慰。反正大致就这些吧，萌新玻璃心的别入，教程全靠贴吧。总体来说值不值得如各位看着办吧，对了，不要vpn也能裸连，但是进入时读条要慢很多。

补充补充，玩了这么多天了，给我的感觉是bug越来越多，一会儿这不行，一会儿那不行，不知道那些经常玩儿的是怎么进去的这么顺畅的，好端端一个游戏被一个垃圾团队糟蹋了，腾讯出个山寨版的吧，这个真心是个好题材。一群垃圾码农，出了问题也不管，绿条都不能顺利读完，花钱买游戏还不如玩盗版感觉好你们也真的是人才，建议大家都买大厂的游戏，这种小团队真的伤不起，我现在最后悔的就是居然买了你们的DLC，祝制作组发行商早死早升天，免得你们祸害更多人。春节促销就是个坑！

This is a really fun game especially either as a Killer or a Survivor. It is really rewarding when you do your objective right.

THE COMPLAIN I HAVE IS THE MATCHMAKING. Aside from it sometimes bugging out and returning me to the lobby or showing infinite loading screen. The BALANCE with other players, specifically the killer, I don't know how many times I had to face a high rank killer, those red ranks, Rank 1 mostly and the worst part is my party were like me, low ranks, the highest probably Rank 18. The only solution I can think of is to grind this out and level up your character till you get your perks but playing against high ranked killers make the grind even harder when you've got a bunch of low ranks versus a high rank killer. 
Not that it's always in the favour of Killers though, there've been times were its Low Rank Killer vs High Rank Survivors. The matchmaking sucks for both ends especially for the beginners as they are forced to keep losing until they grind out their chosen character's level, as if this game wasn't grindy enough.   

This is game is really fun gameplay-wise but matchmaking ruins it, I won't recommend this game till it gets fixed.

[b] UPDATE: [/b] 
I tried playing again and it seems they fixed the loading screen problem, the UI is more sleek now too. As for the matchmaking I think the only way to fix this is to A) Grind your chosen character and with his/her bloodpoint, use it to upgrade your other characters or B) Spam killer and do the same. Then when you get bored, use the other characters to mix it up, rinse and repeat, then suddenly the matchmaking isn't so bad. With this I think I'll recommend it now.

I would not suggest this game if you like to be able to play several games in one sitting.

A few years later: I've changed my stance on this game since my original review. I have hundreds of hours on Xbox and on this game through the Microsoft store. (Have different characters on different platforms) Finding games is much easier now and the updates have been great.

So mal wieder ein neues Review von meiner Seite aus her,

Momentan muss ich sagen läuft das Spiel eigentlich super gut, ein wenig hier und da muss noch gearbeitet werden.
Aber sind wir mal ehrlich in welchem Spiel bitte nicht? Wer nicht darauf steht Gecampt oder getunnelt (Fame) zu werden damit der Killer auch mal denkt er hat Freunde demjenigen würde ich das Spiel abraten.
Aber mal so unter uns und ganz im Vertrauen, die meisten Killer brauchen wirklich Freunde. Klingt zwar komisch, ist aber so.

Aber sowohl als Killer und auch als Survivor kann man mittlerweile wieder mehr Spaß haben, klar Momente gibt es die nicht mehr ganz so Knorke sind aber nun ja, haste nix Machste nix.

Das einzige was ich zu bemängeln habe, also so WIRKLICH zu bemängeln habe ist das seid dem "Ruin"-Nerf jeder 0815 Spieler ins High-rank kommen. 
Und dann noch meistens die Größte klappe im End Screen haben obwohl sie nach 4 Sekunden Jagd gefühlt liegen.
Ist ärgerlich als auch lustig.

Wer im End Screen ein GG, WP erwartet ist hier gänzlich falsch. Meistens kommen eher Ausdrücke oder EZ zum Vorschein, weil die survivor ja mit dem Nerf sooooo toll sind das sie davor immer im Rank 12 bereicht gespielt haben xD

I'm 52 minutes into this game and 30 of it was spent loading.

The rest of it was spent doing exactly 4 matches where I died in about as many minutes, or I ran around aimlessly as the Killer in one map because I couldn't see jack shit.

I had to edit the ENGINE.INI file for it to even work at all since I have AMD Eyefinity, and the game does NOT have any sort of resolution selection options other than a "Slider" to scale it down from fullscreen. So no, you can't blame this game on one monitor while you multitask. Having resolution selection is too hard for the developers to include, so I have to play with a ridiculously wide and broken FOV so I can't see jack.

Overall, I regret getting this game and asking my friends to buy it so we could all play. Just to get it to play was a nightmare, then actually trying to adjust and have fun is impossible just hitting "quick play". People are either siginificantly better than I am, or cheating, I really can't tell. All I know is as the survivor, I can't NOT get my ass ripped apart in 3 minutes, and as the Killer all the survivors have to do is stand still and they might as well be invisible because EVERYTHING IS THE SAME SHADE OF GREY.

I have never left a review on a game, and I've never demanded a refund. I am about two inches away from demanding a refund on this game.

A día de hoy, lo siento pero no.
Después de tantos años, sigue teniendo cosas buenas pero en general, creo que está obsoleto.

Das Spiel für 13 € wäre wahrscheinlich der Hammer, wenn man es denn spielen könnte. Lobby Wartezeiten von 10 Minuten + sind leider normal. Von 25 Spielstunden waren so ca. 10 in der Lobby. Wenn man denn dann endlich mal ein Spiel gefunden hat ist das aber noch nicht die Rettung. Nein, entweder verlässt der Killer spontan die Lobby a la "Hey, ich wollte doch garnicht spielen!" , einer der 3 Mitspieler ist mittlerweile auf der Suche nach Nahrung gestorben oder das Spiel startet  -  Falls ihr nicht das Glück habt wie ich und meine Freundin, die wir uns besser zu beschäftigen wissen in der Wartezeit dann Hut ab für die Geduld!  Egal - falls man dann drin ist kann man nochmal hoffen. Hab ich ein laggenden Killer? Selbstverständlich müssen die Spieler bei 13€ Angebot Preis die Spiele selbst hosten und nunja, das macht halt nicht jeder Toaster mit leider. Falls denn ein Mitspieler dabei ist der nicht AFK oder disconnected ist bei der Verbindung hat man noch das Glück entweder einen Camper oder nicht sehr hilfreiche Mitspieler zu haben, die einen einfach mal am Haken hängen lassen einen gefühlte ewigkeit, aber kein Problem, der Spieler der AFK ist wird sich scher gleich dem Problem annehmen. Nichts desto trotz hat das Spiel viel potenzial & macht echt gut Laune wenn man denn eine Private Lobby hostet oder ohne die oben genannten Probleme spielen kann. Bei den derzeitigen Zuständen aber definitiv keine Kaufempfehlung. Falls es sich bessert lohnt es sich auf jeden Fall.
